name: UAnimNotifyState_TimedNiagaraEffectAdvanced
doc: Same as Timed Niagara Effect but also provides some more advanced abilities at an additional cost.

bEnableNormalizedNotifyProgress: This send a 0-1 value of the normalized progress to the FX Component to the float User Parameter.
bApplyRateScaleToProgress: Should we apply the animation rate scale when calculating the elasped time.
NotifyProgressUserParameter: The name of your niagara user variable you would like to send the normalized notify progress to.
AnimCurves: Array of fnames to map Anim Curve names to Niagara Parameters.

methods.name: GetNotifyProgress
methods.doc: Returns a 0 to 1 value for the progress of this component along the notify.
